security: The document is marked UNCLASSIFIED, and the content described pertains to a letter regarding an individual's background. There's no immediately evident sensitive information that would compromise operations, agents, or methods.
summary: This document is an exhibit cover sheet for a letter written by Philip LaChapelle Jr. concerning Kenneth C. Griggs, a PFC born in Korea, providing details of the letter's sender, recipient, and subject.
summary_one_paragraph: This exhibit cover sheet, dated January 24, 1968, pertains to a document indexed under the JFK Assassination Records Collection Act. Prepared by the 115th MI Group (IV), the cover sheet describes Exhibit I, which is a copy of a letter dated November 8, 1967, written by Philip LaChapelle Jr. from Chicago, Illinois, to Mr. Cecil L. Griggs in Boise, Idaho, regarding the background of Kenneth C. Griggs, a Private First Class (PFC) born in Korea on December 25, 1946. The file number for this exhibit is 8008-9182, with a reference number 519-46-7994.
title: EXHIBIT COVER SHEET
